text: The Turney Center Industrial Complex is a state prison in Only, Hickman County, Tennessee, owned and operated by the Tennessee Department of Correction. The facility opened in 1971. Turney also has a minimum-security Annex at 245 Carroll Road, Clifton, Wayne County, Tennessee. This facility opened in 1985 and was formerly the Wayne County Boot Camp. ==Notable prisoners== *Brandon E. Banks - rapist in Vanderbilt rape case == References == Category:Prisons in Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures in Hickman County, Tennessee Category:Buildings and structures in Wayne County, Tennessee Category:1971 establishments in Tennessee
title: Turney Center Industrial Complex
